meanings.definition: The study or science of veins.
meanings.sent1: In venologies, researchers examine the structure and function of veins.
meanings.sent2: Doctors specializing in venologies often diagnose and treat vein-related conditions.
meanings.sent3: Learning about venologies can help you understand how blood circulates in the body.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of venologies was as deep as the veins she studied.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on venologies painted a detailed picture of the vascular system.

meanings.definition: The medical specialty concerned with the treatment of vein disorders.
meanings.sent1: After completing her training in venologies, she opened a clinic for vein treatments.
meanings.sent2: Patients seek help from experts in venologies for varicose veins and other issues.
meanings.sent3: The humor in the hospital revolved around puns related to venologies.
meanings.sent4: His skill in venologies was a lifesaver for many patients with vein problems.
meanings.sent5: The success of the surgery showcased the effectiveness of venologies in practice.
